User Story: A concise description of the requirement with a clear user persona, goal, and benefit. Acceptance Criteria: Define measurable and testable conditions to validate the successful implementation of the requirement. Test Cases: Create specific test cases with inputs, steps, and expected results that align with the acceptance criteria.
Inputs Provided:
Requirement: Requirement Defined above Salesforce Metadata Context: Object Details: [e.g., objects involved, fields, relationships] Profiles/Roles: [e.g., user roles and profiles affected] Record Types: [e.g., applicable record types] Automation: [e.g., flows, triggers, workflows impacting the requirement] Customizations: [e.g., custom fields, custom objects, validation rules] Integrations: [e.g., APIs, external systems involved]
